functionality: Use the GetObject function to access an ActiveX object from a file and assign the object to an object variable. Use the Set statement to assign the object returned by GetObject to the object variable.
example_code:
Dim objApp As SolidEdge.Framework.Interop.Application 
 objApp = GetObject( , 'SolidEdge.Application')
questions: Get the Solid Edge application running.
obtain an instance of the running Solid Edge

functionality: Creates and returns a reference to an ActiveX object.
example_code:
Dim objApp As SolidEdge.Framework.Interop.Application 
 objApp = CreateObject('SolidEdge.Application')
questions: Create an instance of the Solid Edge application.
